thread.title: OKX Ventures Backs Aspecta to Enhance Price Discovery for Illiquid Assets - Blockchain.News
thread.title_full: OKX Ventures Backs Aspecta to Enhance Price Discovery for Illiquid Assets - Blockchain.News

author: blockchain.news
title: OKX Ventures Backs Aspecta to Enhance Price Discovery for Illiquid Assets - Blockchain.News
text:
OKX Ventures, the investment division of the prominent crypto exchange and onchain technology leader OKX, has declared its strategic investment in Aspecta, a universal price discovery infrastructure. This move is aimed at bolstering the open economy for trillions in illiquid assets, as reported by OKX Ventures.
Aspecta's Growing Influence
Aspecta has established itself as a key player in the asset trading domain, boasting over 700,000 users and facilitating more than 80 million asset trades through its BuildKey framework. The project benefits from the support of influential incubators like Yale University's Tsai Center for Innovative Thinking and various global investors including YZi Labs, IDG Blockchain, and Spartan Group.
Strategic Collaboration
OKX Ventures' investment signifies a commitment to deeper collaboration with Aspecta. Jeff Ren, Founder of OKX Ventures, emphasized the importance of on-chain adoption of illiquid assets for scaling the blockchain economy. He expressed excitement about partnering with Aspecta to advance this mission through strategic investments and resource support.
Jack He, Co-Founder of Aspecta, expressed enthusiasm about the partnership, highlighting the potential of pioneering a blockchain-native liquidity engine that could unlock on-chain potential for real-world assets (RWAs) and illiquid assets globally.
Future Prospects
Looking forward, OKX Ventures plans to work closely with Aspecta to unlock on-chain liquidity for RWAs and other illiquid assets on a trillion-dollar scale. The collaboration aims to accelerate the global adoption of the open economy framework through ecosystem integrations, partnership development, and long-term initiatives.
About OKX Ventures
OKX Ventures is dedicated to exploring leading blockchain projects worldwide, supporting blockchain technology innovation, and promoting healthy development within the global blockchain industry. It invests in projects with long-term structural value, providing support to entrepreneurs contributing to blockchain advancements.
